Text.val: 24.01.2013 SH SCR17890 (see also SCR16711) Extended picture from 7 to 9 for strange implemented ranges on
02.01.2013 GB SCR17815 Fixed problem with PI.IN_CURRENCY = space when GB902 is called
08.10.2012 SH SCR17574 Changed Blob Ansi to Unicode blob (CPKC)
30.08.2011 GB SCR16711 Fixed problem with crashes this program
06.05.2011 JOH SCR16404 Replaced GNRL_CURRENCY by ADMN_CURRENCY
30.03.2010 AK copy CPKC_REMARKS to the new PQS if PI.COPYCOMMENTS?=Y
08.12.2009 AK SCR15066 changed only some comments (no functional change)
18.09.2009 AK SCR14880 only added some comments
11.09.2009 AK SCR14880 check special accout code 4 and 46 on INVO_MARKCODESPEC
11.09.2009 AK SCR14880 remove DEBC_LEGALCOLLECTION<>'Y' from basic SQL query

SQL_STMT_U.val:
select LEGAL_DEBH, cast(sum (INVO_AACTUALH) as decimal(13,2)) balance, cast(sum (DUE90PLUS) as decimal(13,2)) DUE90PLUS, cast(sum (INVA_ACTAFACTORING) as decimal(13,2)) SUM_ACTAFACTORING from ( select INVO_ADMNO, INVO_CLNTNO, INVO_DEBH_NO, DEBH_LEGALOWNER_DEBH, case when DEBH_LEGALOWNER_DEBH=0 then INVO_DEBH_NO else DEBH_LEGALOWNER_DEBH end LEGAL_DEBH, INVO_DEBC_NO, INVO_DEBC_DEBC, INVO_DUEDATE, days(':2') - days(INVO_DUEDATE), INVO_AACTUALH, INVA_ACTAFACTORING, case when days(':2') - days(INVO_DUEDATE) <0 and INVO_AACTUALH >0 then INVO_AACTUALH else 0 end NOTDUE, case when days(':2') - days(INVO_DUEDATE) between 0 and 30 and INVO_AACTUALH >0 then INVO_AACTUALH else 0 end DUE0130, case when days(':2') - days(INVO_DUEDATE) between 31 and 60 and INVO_AACTUALH >0 then INVO_AACTUALH else 0 end DUE3160, case when days(':2') - days(INVO_DUEDATE) between 61 and 90 and INVO_AACTUALH >0 then INVO_AACTUALH else 0 end DUE6190, case when days(':2') - days(INVO_DUEDATE) >90 and INVO_AACTUALH >0 then INVO_AACTUALH else 0 end DUE90PLUS, case when INVO_AACTUALH <0 then INVO_AACTUALH else 0 end NOTCLEARED
from :1/invo join :1/inva on inva_no=invo_no and inva_currency=':8' join :1/debc on DEBC_NO = INVO_DEBC_NO and ((DEBC_ADMNO=:3 and DEBC_CLNTNO = :4) or DEBC_ADMNO*100000+DEBC_CLNTNO in (:7)) join :1/debh on DEBH_NO = INVO_DEBH_NO
where INVO_AACTUALH<>0 and INVO_MARKCODESPEC<> :5 and INVO_MARKCODESPEC<> :6 and
DEBC_DATDELETED is null
order by INVO_DEBH_NO )BSEL
group by LEGAL_DEBH
order by sum (INVO_AACTUALH) DESC

Text.val: get DEBC_NO as input for BDC151 (if exsist on miain client)
If client is insured by ICF then CPKC_REINSURANCELIMIT should be empty
else call BDC151 with callprog = OID705 only for the reinsurance limit

SQL_STMT_U.val:
select debc_no
from :1/DEBH join :1/debc on DEBH_NO=debc_debh and DEBC_ADMNO*100000+DEBC_CLNTNO in (:2) and DEBC_DATDELETED is null
where DEBH_LEGALOWNER_DEBH = :3 or DEBH_NO = :3

select cast(sum (INVO_AACTUALH) as decimal(13,2)) BALANCE, cast(sum (NOTDUE) as decimal(13,2)) NOTDUE, cast(sum (DUE0130) as decimal(13,2)) DUE0130, cast(sum (DUE3160) as decimal(13,2)) DUE3160, cast(sum (DUE6190) as decimal(13,2)) DUE6190, cast(sum (DUE90PLUS) as decimal(13,2)) DUE90PLUS, cast(sum (NOTCLEARED) as decimal(13,2)) NOTCLEARED
from ( select INVO_ADMNO, INVO_CLNTNO, INVO_DEBH_NO, DEBH_LEGALOWNER_DEBH, case when DEBH_LEGALOWNER_DEBH=0 then INVO_DEBH_NO else DEBH_LEGALOWNER_DEBH end LEGAL_DEBH, INVO_DEBC_NO, INVO_DEBC_DEBC, INVO_DUEDATE, days(':2') - days(INVO_DUEDATE), INVO_AACTUALH, case when days(':2') - days(INVO_DUEDATE) <0 and INVO_AACTUALH >0 then INVO_AACTUALH else 0 end NOTDUE, case when days(':2') - days(INVO_DUEDATE) between 0 and 30 and INVO_AACTUALH >0 then INVO_AACTUALH else 0 end DUE0130, case when days(':2') - days(INVO_DUEDATE) between 31 and 60 and INVO_AACTUALH >0 then INVO_AACTUALH else 0 end DUE3160, case when days(':2') - days(INVO_DUEDATE) between 61 and 90 and INVO_AACTUALH >0 then INVO_AACTUALH else 0 end DUE6190, case when days(':2') - days(INVO_DUEDATE) >90 and INVO_AACTUALH >0 then INVO_AACTUALH else 0 end DUE90PLUS, case when INVO_AACTUALH <0 then INVO_AACTUALH else 0 end NOTCLEARED
from :1/invo join :1/debc on DEBC_NO = INVO_DEBC_NO and ((DEBC_ADMNO=:3 and DEBC_CLNTNO = :4) or DEBC_ADMNO*100000+DEBC_CLNTNO in (:7)) join :1/debh on DEBH_NO = INVO_DEBH_NO
where INVO_AACTUALH<>0 and INVO_MARKCODESPEC<> :5 and INVO_MARKCODESPEC<> :6 and
DEBC_DATDELETED is null
order by INVO_DEBH_NO )BSEL
